lines.content: * Abstract class representing a generic action to be executed by BotManager.
* Executes the action, returning a message and possibly mutating the taskList.
* May also throw a BotException, if the action could not be executed.
* @param taskList Task list to be mutated.
* @return A message representing the result of the execution.
* @throws BotException If the action could not be executed.
public abstract String execute(TaskList taskList) throws BotException;
* Action to add a task to the task list.
* Adds a task to the taskList and returns a message representing the task added.
* @param taskList Task list to add the task to.
* Action to delete a task from the task list.
* @param taskIndex Index for the task to be deleted.
* Deletes a task from the taskList and returns a message representing the task deleted.
* @param taskList Task list to delete the task from.
public String execute(TaskList taskList) throws TaskIndexOutOfRangeException {
* Action to find all tasks matching a given search string.
* @param searchString Search string inputted by the user.
* Returns a string of all tasks in the given taskList matching the searchString.
* @param taskList Task list to find tasks from.
* @return String of all tasks in the task list matching the search string.
* Returns the list of commands and their usages.
* @param taskList The task list to be mutated, unused.
* @return List of commands and their usages.
* Returns a list of all tasks in a taskList.
* @param taskList The task list to be displayed.
* Action to mark a task as done.
* @param taskIndex Index for the task to be marked as done.
* Marks a task from the taskList as done and returns a message representing the task.
* @param taskList Task list with the task to mark as done.
* @return Message representing the task marked as done.
* @throws TaskIndexOutOfRangeException If taskIndex is out of range.
public String execute(TaskList taskList) throws TaskIndexOutOfRangeException {
* Action to mark a task as undone.
* @param taskIndex Index for the task to be marked as undone.
* Marks a task from the taskList as undone and returns a message representing the task.
* @param taskList Task list with the task to mark as undone.
* @return Message representing the task marked as undone.
* @throws TaskIndexOutOfRangeException If taskIndex is out of range.
public String execute(TaskList taskList) throws TaskIndexOutOfRangeException {

* Prints a welcome message and initialises a scanner.
String greetMessage = "Hello, I'm BotManager, your friendly task assistant!\n"
+ "What can I do for you? (Type 'help' to view all available commands)";
* Prints a goodbye message and closes the scanner.
String goodbyeMessage = "Goodbye! Hope to see you again soon!";
* Shows a file loading error message.
String loadErrorMessage = "File data/tasks.txt not found! Initialising empty file...";
* Shows a file saving error message.
String saveErrorMessage = "Tasks could not be saved! Please check that the data file has not been removed";
* Prints the given message with indentations and dividers.

* Enum representing the different commands available.
DEADLINE("deadline", "deadline <name> /by <end date>", "Add a deadline with name and end date "),
"Add an event with name, start date and end date"),
MARK("mark", "mark <task index>", "mark task with corresponding task index as done"),
UNMARK("unmark", "unmark <task index>", "unmark task with corresponding task index as undone"),
DELETE("delete", "delete <task index>", "delete task with corresponding task index"),
FIND("find", "find <search string>", "find task with matching search string"),
Command(String input, String usage, String description) {

1. [T][ ] first
